This spacious two-story home offers 5 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms across 2,204 square feet of thoughtfully designed living space. The open-concept layout features a bright living room, dedicated dining area, and a modern kitchen equipped with a full suite of appliances, generous cabinet space, and a walk-in pantry. Downstairs includes a private bedroom with a nearby half bath and walk-in closet—perfect for guests or a home office. Upstairs, you’ll find four additional bedrooms including a spacious primary suite with a walk-in closet and en suite bathroom. An upstairs laundry room with hookups adds everyday convenience. Enjoy a fully fenced backyard ideal for outdoor lounging or entertaining, along with an attached 2-car garage and additional driveway parking. Located near N Curry Rd and W Woodruff Rd, with easy access to I-10, and just minutes from local shops and restaurants.

Listing.description:
Modern Luxury in East Atlanta – The Parc Townhome
Welcome to 1324 Parc Bench Rd SE, a beautifully crafted 3-bed, 2.5-bath townhome offering 1,415 sq ft of sunlit living in one of East Atlanta’s newest boutique communities. Built in 2024, this home features a sleek open floor plan, a chef’s kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, center island, pantry, and modern lighting. The spacious primary suite includes a private bath and walk-in closet. Additional perks include a 2-car garage, brand new full size washer & dryer and attic storage
Enjoy walkable access to Glen Emerald Park and a short drive to East Atlanta Village, Inman Park, and the BeltLine. Quick access to I‑20 makes commuting a breeze. HOA covers exterior maintenance and grounds for low-maintenance living.
Updated photos coming soon. Contact us today for a private tour!
